description: average area per leaf, = total_area / no_leaves
leaf mass per area for entire leaf = 1000*total_mass/total_area
mass of rachis (zero for simple leaves)
projected area of rachis (zero for simple leaves)
average area per leaflet, = (total_area - rachis_area)/ no_leaflets
leaf mass per area for leaflet = 1000*(total_mass-rachis_mass)/(total_area-rachis_area)
